reviewGeneral.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Lenore is a 4-cost Strike who can do a lot of things. Not only she's quite tanky for her cost, but she can counter attacks, detect Stealth, reduce enemy DEF, deal HP% damage, knock enemies back, remove Barriers, and grant Sure Fire to herself. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Woah. That was a long list. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Overall Lenore is like a swiss army knife that can do a lot of things, but there's a cost to the versatility - everything she does is a bit worse than someone who is specialized can do. It's not a big issue, but it will become important when you need to choose someone for the team - especially in PVE and especially because of her 4-cost. Still, because of the Counter mechanic, she is very useful in Raids because on top of shredding the boss DEF, she can also protect her allies from certain attacks.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Lenore biggest issue is her Ultimate. It's a charge-type Ultimate which brings her further to the frontline and can get killed if used at a wrong time - it's an issue because while she has a lot of tools to deal with the enemy, she lacks defensive measures.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

pros.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Can do it all - DEF Shred, Remove Barriers, Detect Stealth,","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Good stats so it's easy to keep her alive,","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Counter helps in keeping her teammates alive,","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Good in both PVE and PVP.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

cons.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Jack of all trades, master of none,","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Ultimate sometimes can get her killed in PVP.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

description.description: A melee attacker specializing in weakening enemies and counterattacking

baseDescription.baseDescription: Swipes her mechanical arm, dealing AoE damage in front. When receiving an attack while casting Basic attack or while moving, consumes 1 [Deceive] stack to perform a barrier removing counter attack, and inflicting knockback.

Lenore can detect Stealth units. After receiving 15 hits, obtain 1 stack of [Deceive] which increases EVA by 50% (Max 4 stacks, Uncancelable). All of Lenoreâ€™s attacks inflicts 1 stack of [Sentence]. At 4 [Sentence] stacks, enforces [Execution] on enemies (excluding Bosses), dealing 15% of current HP as damage. Enemies with [Execution] does not accumulate [Sentence]. 

[Sentence]: DEF reduced by 5% for 6s

[Execution]: DEF reduced by 20% for 12s.

level5.level5: Recovers 1 Deployment Resource if there are no other units present on the field.

baseDescription.baseDescription: Negates damage upon receiving hitstun from Special skills and stabs the mechanical arm, dealing AoE damage in front and knocking enemies down.

level5.level5: Obtains 2 stacks of [Deceive] after casting skill.

baseDescription.baseDescription: Scratches forward while invincible and knocks enemies back on the final hit. Removes barriers on damaged enemies and grants Lenore Sure Fire for 15s after casting

level5.level5: Obtains 4 stacks of [Deceive] after casting skill.
